keyword: how many calories in a reeses cup mini
title: How Many Calories in a Reese's Mini Cup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a reeses cup mini, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Reese's Mini Cup?
assumptions: Standard milk chocolate peanut butter mini cup (~9 g), as commercially produced; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, batch, size, and any modifications; check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One Reese's mini cup has about 45 calories, with 5 g carbs and 1 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add a drizzle of caramel (1 tsp per cup)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Reese's mini cup?
What are the macros for a reeses cup mini?
faqs.a: About 3 g fat, 5 g carbs (4 g sugars), and 1 g protein.

faqs.q: Does a Reese's mini have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat per mini cup.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a reeses cup mini?
faqs.a: Around 35 mg sodium per mini cup.

faqs.q: Are Reese's minis high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, with 4 g sugars per mini cup; enjoy in moderation.
